content: उपचि {c5c} <ab>U.</ab> {@--1@} To gather together, heap up, accumulate, collect; शश्वत्सिद्धैरुपचितबलिं <ls>Me. 55.</ls> {@--2@} To add, increase, strengthen; उपचिन्वन् प्रभां तन्वीं प्रत्याह परमेश्वरः <ls>Ku. 6. 25</ls>; चेतःपीडामुपचिनोति <ls>Mu. 2</ls>; अधोधः पश्यतः कस्य महिमा नोपचीयते <ls>H. 2. 2</ls>; <ls>Bk. 6. 33</ls>; <ls>Śi. 4. 10</ls>; <ls n="Śi.">8. 6</ls>; उपचीयमानगर्भा <ls>K. 66</ls> being developed; बलेनैव सहोपचीयते मदः <ls>K. 290</ls>; क्षीणोप्युपचीयते पुनश्चंद्रः <ls>Bh. 2. 87</ls> waxes. {@--3@} To cover over with; <ls>Śi. 9. 35</ls>; <ls>Ms. 6. 41.</ls> {%--<ab>pass.</ab>%} {@--1@} To be collected or accumulated; to increase, become strong, to be covered with &c.; see above. {@--2@} To be prosperous, succeed, thrive, be better off; चत्वारस्तूपचीयंते विप्र आढ्यो वणिङ् नृपः <ls>Ms. 8. 169.</ls>
